title: Hydrogen
author: Hydrogen
content: QuoteTaken from JRE #1921 w/Peter Zaihan:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ED_yPDdqG5YIn case it wasn't obvious from the title, he's predicting the demise of china within 10 years.This parallels some of the common observations made on china over the years. With good points and statistics I hadn't heard before.

comments.author: montaga
comments.body: No way, look what magic tech they have available. Phone will tell you when you sick and when its time for house arrest.https://www.bitchute.com/video/nWYTg79qnkDd/

comments.author: Gyfts
comments.body: The great thing about communism is when millions of people are killed off after governmental/economic collapse, the net resources to sustain the population goes down. It's within China's interest to have the deadweights die off. China, much like Japan, is experiencing a labor issue with not enough young people being born to help subsidize the older generation. When the collapse comes, the first people that start to die are the older folks who can't help themselves.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I have also read on internet about China being actually unstable in spite of her economical position.The problem of the Chinese model is that her political centralization and the widespread corruption could lead to a domino effect which could fragment the country, it is one of the disadvantages of autocracy.Those poor people literally have to work until dead to sustain the economy, led by the party and their corporate partners.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Take a look at it. Each Province of China is essentially its own country. It's always been this way. Their common relations are based on organized trade between them, not that they have ever had a really strong central government.When the main inter-provincial trade is disrupted sufficiently, the whole togetherness will collapse, and we will have 23 separate countries. Trade is collapsing right now.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: That guy is talking out his shit. What does he mean 10 years and they all gonna wipe out? They are more than a Billion, take half of it and they are still more than enough to battle 10 invading armies.He clearly is outdated in the information about what is happening in China. They already has thier own chip development. https://www.technologyreview.com/2023/01/04/1066136/chinese-legacy-chips-advantage/The Chinese had been to the worse of thier lives exposed to the worse polluted air like the Indians thier neighbors, the people who live in the worse situation will always become the smartest and strongest.

comments.author: montaga
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on January 11, 2023, 02:06:29 PMTake a look at it. Each Province of China is essentially its own country. It's always been this way. Their common relations are based on organized trade between them, not that they have ever had a really strong central government.When the main inter-provincial trade is disrupted sufficiently, the whole togetherness will collapse, and we will have 23 separate countries. Trade is collapsing right now.How did you come to the magic number of 23 countries?One thing is certain once the collapse is done and over with the Chinese will reclaim the land they left behind. The heart land, native Mandarin speakers will again form the Republic of China. Cantonese  will form the own country, so are inner Mongolia... Most likely all three Koreans to form a country. Ten new possible but 23?

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: montaga on January 11, 2023, 02:53:56 PMQuote from: BADecker on January 11, 2023, 02:06:29 PMTake a look at it. Each Province of China is essentially its own country. It's always been this way. Their common relations are based on organized trade between them, not that they have ever had a really strong central government.When the main inter-provincial trade is disrupted sufficiently, the whole togetherness will collapse, and we will have 23 separate countries. Trade is collapsing right now.How did you come to the magic number of 23 countries?One thing is certain once the collapse is done and over with the Chinese will reclaim the land they left behind. The heart land, native Mandarin speakers will again form the Republic of China. Cantonese  will form the own country, so are inner Mongolia... Most likely all three Koreans to form a country. Ten new possible but 23?Sorry. Need to proofread better. Must have hit 2-3 rather than 3-4. But check out https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Provinces_of_China.

comments.author: montaga
comments.body: When you get your heating from a central source you end up with next to no heating at -26°C -14.8F "HUMINERAL" https://youtu.be/ODyBvUnQnFIProvincial borders are meaninglessChinas ethnic groups
